org.apache.cassandra.repair

Class Differencer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.repair.Differencer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Differencer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runs on the node that initiated a request to compare two trees, and launch repairs for disagreeing ranges.

      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      In order to remove completed Differencer, equality is computed only from desc and endpoint part of two TreeResponses.
